FieldPositionChild
FieldPositionManager
Batch
Manager that decides the handlers based on the content of a field in the specified position in a record. The fields in the record are separated by a separator. The value of the specified field is taken as key in the flow-table.
See also
Github - FieldPositionManager Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.batch.FieldPositionRecordHandlerManager
Syntax
Copy
<FieldPositionManager />
Attributes
Required

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
fieldNr	number	-
Position of field that identifies the recordtype (position of first field is 1)
separator	text	-
Separator that separates the fields in the record
RecordHandlerManager
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEF
